Package com.msasc.lib.db.rdbms.sql

Class Select

java.lang.Object
com.msasc.lib.db.rdbms.SQL
com.msasc.lib.db.rdbms.sql.Select
public class Select extends SQL
Builder of SELECT queries, handling the type of each result column to facilitate the subsequent reading of the results.
Author:
Miquel Sas

      public void select(String expr, String alias, Types type)

      Parameters:

      alias - The alias.
      type - The expected date type.

    • select

      public void select(String expr, String alias, Types type, Integer decimals)
      Add an expression indicating an alias, a type and optionally the number of decimal places. A field is created to support the expression.
      Parameters:
      expr - The expression.
      alias - The alias.
      type - The expected date type.
      decimals - Optional number of decimal places.
